text: I'll be live in the studio with Gary Cee on his morning show, playing original songs. Don't miss it!

I'm very excited to be making be making my debut at The Olive Pit. I'll be playing a smattering of great tunes spanning decades and genres. Entertaining you with some funny anecdote's tidbit's of music trivia. Come out have some great food and a good time with me and the gang at The Olive Pit.

I'm very excited to be making be making my debut at The Creative Compound. I'll be playing a smattering of great tunes spanning decades and genres. Entertaining you with some funny anecdote's tidbit's of music trivia. Come out have some an awesome Sunday morning with me. Hope to see you there!

I'm very excited to be making be making my debut at Angry Erik Brewing. I'll be playing a smattering of great tunes spanning decades and genres. Entertaining you with some funny anecdote's and tidbit's of music trivia. Come out have an awesome Sunday afternoon with me and the crew at Angry Erik Brewing. Hope to see you there!
